title: Rich and creamy sweet potato soup
ingredients: ['2 tbsp butter', '2 shallots, peeled and finely chopped', '4 large sweet potatoes, peeled and cut in thick slices', '125 ml dry white wine', 'Water, as needed', '1 small pinch of salt', '1 bay leaf', '3 tbsp creme fraiche', '2 tbsp butter, salted', '200g (7 oz) grated Gouda cheese', '4 teaspoons single cream for garnish']
